item.title: Books
item.author: tapan@karecha.com (Tapan Karecha)
item.description: A personal summary of books I have ready and/or am reading. I started doing this in the beginning of 2024. I may later add some books that I read prior. How to Live on Twenty-Four Hours a Day Author: Arnold Bennett Reviewed on: 07 September 2024 Most people go through life without putting much effort into their work or passions. They’re bored, unfulfilled, and wondering where the time went. But it doesn’t have to be that way.
